subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jamie Vardy’s record scoring streak came to an end on Saturday, but Leicester still moved to the top of the Premier League standings with a 3-0 win at Swansea and Manchester City’s 2-0 loss at Stoke City.
snippet: Jamie Vardy’s record scoring streak came to an end on Saturday, but Leicester still moved to the top of the Premier League standings with a 3-0 win at Swansea and Manchester City’s 2-0 loss at Stoke City.
